text:
@realDonaldTrump I am so tired of your lies on @SpeakerPelosi, @MichelleObama and the governors!! I don't think you realize you lie so much. It has a name, pathological!!!  Sociopathic, grudge-holding toddler, this is called truth!  You're not familiar with it!

https://t.co/NbSJXJTYTE
